author: daneofurexistence

text: +Dane Tucker SF2 arcade soundtrack was actually the one that first got me into VGM... at like 6 or 7 years old. I remember there was a soundtrack CD that came with Nintendo Magazine, and I used to listen to it all the time. I was quite surprised to go back and discover that the composer for the CPS1 tracks was in fact Shimomura! It wasn't until the advent of FFVII and Uematsu that I started becoming curious about it as a standalone genre, though.
author: Harkz0r

text: I'm legitimately shocked that this song hadn't been added to the list yet.  I'd say that both this song along with the themes for Guile and Ken are the most recognizable themes from the Street Fighter universe.
